00005 #include "ral_servo.h"
00006 #include "ral_motor.h"

00021 struct Servo_Struct* Servo_Init(struct Servo_Struct* SS, struct Motor_Struct* MS, int PWMLowerSide, int PWMUpperSide, int range){
00022         SS->MS = MS;
00023         SS->PWMLowerSide = PWMLowerSide;
00024         SS->PWMUpperSide = PWMUpperSide;
00025         SS->AngleRange = range;
00026         SS->PWMEach = (PWMUpperSide - PWMLowerSide) / range;
00027         return SS;
00028 }
00029 
00038 void Servo_SetRelative(struct Servo_Struct* SS, int angle){
00039         int currPWM = SS->MS->currPWM;
00040         int newPWM = currPWM + angle * SS->PWMEach;
00041         if(newPWM > SS->PWMUpperSide)newPWM = SS->PWMUpperSide;
00042         else if(newPWM < SS->PWMLowerSide)newPWM = SS->PWMLowerSide;
00043         Motor_SetPWM(SS->MS,newPWM);
00044         return;
00045 }
00046 
00053 void Servo_SetAbsolute(struct Servo_Struct* SS, int angle){
00054         int newPWM = angle * SS->PWMEach + SS->PWMLowerSide;
00055         if(newPWM > SS->PWMUpperSide)newPWM = SS->PWMUpperSide;
00056         else if(newPWM < SS->PWMLowerSide)newPWM = SS->PWMLowerSide;
00057         Motor_SetPWM(SS->MS,newPWM);
00058         return;
00059 }
